SELECT u.id as id, CONCAT(u.name,"/",IFNULL(u.phone,"")) AS uNamePhone, u.name as name, u.phone as phone, u.project_id as projectId, r.role_code as roleCode FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id =ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id =role_id WHERE u.project_id = #{projectId} AND (r.role_code LIKE CONCAT ('role_sys_admin_',#{tenantCode}) OR r.role_code LIKE CONCAT ('role_project_admin_',#{tenantCode}))
